full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/22/2023 Form FS-510 (English) (2-68) Page 2 25. Personal financial resources (a) Cash (c) Real estate (value) (b) Bank deposits (d) Other (describe) 26. Father's name and address (If deceased, so state giving year of death) BLI QUAME HOAM 27. Mother's maiden name and address (if deceased, so state giving year of death) LE THE MHOM 28. Name and address of next of kin in home country (If neither parent is living) 29. List all places of residence for 6 months or more since your sixteenth birthday City or town Province Country Dates (From-To) Calling or occupation SAIGON U.M 30 List all organizations you are now or have been a member of or affiliated with since your sixteenth birthday (Include professional, vocational, social and political organizations) Name and address Dates (From-To) Type of membership and office beld, if any 31. List all languages, including your own, that you can speak, read and write Language Speak Read Write WETNAMESE N. 32. Inclusive dates of previous residence in or visits to the United States (Give type of visa or status) (If never, so state) NEVER 33. Have you ever been treated in a hospital, institution or elsewhere for a mental disorder, drug addiction or Yes No alcoholism? (If answer is Yes, explain) 34. Have you ever been arrested, convicted or confined in a prison, or have you ever been placed in a poorhouse Yes No or other charitable institution? (If answer is Yes, explain) 35. Have you ever been the beneficiary of a pardon, amnesty, rehabilitation decree, other act of clemency or Yes No similar action? (If answer is Yes, explain) 36. Have you ever applied for a visa to enter the United States? (If answer is Yes, state where and when, whetber Yes No you applied for a nonimmigrant or an immigrant visa and whether the visa was issued or refused) 37. Have you been refused admission to the United States during the last 12 months? Yes No (If answer is Yes, explain) 38. Have you ever registered with a draft board under United States Selective Service laws? Yes No (If answer is Yes, explain) 39. Have you ever applied for relief from training and service in the United States armed forces or departed Yes No from or remained outside the United States to avoid or evade military service? (If answer is Yes, explain) 40. Do you intend to enter the United States from Canada, Mexico or an island adjacent to the United States Yes No within two years after arrival in Canada, Mexico or such adjacent island? (Hf answer is Yes, give the name of the transportation company by which you entered or intend to enter Canada, Mexico or such island)
